Game.Name: Kiss x Kiss Seirei Gakuen (Japan)
Game.plot: Kiss x Kiss: Seirei Gakuen is a Strategy game, developed by Kamui and published by Bandai,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: Unlock MinatoAt the title screen where it says 'push start button', enter the cheat. You should hear a laugh if you've done it correctly. Minato will be at the Park after school the next time you go there (it doesn't matter if you start a new game over or load a saved game).
